de.erichseifert.gral.graphics

Class AbstractDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.graphics.AbstractDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractLegend.AbstractSymbol, DrawableContainer, Label, PlotArea

    public abstract class AbstractDrawable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable, java.io.Serializable
    Abstract implementation of the Drawable interface. This class implements common functionality like the different ways for getting and setting the bounding rectangle of the drawable object.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
